summary:
Adds English subtitles to the Draugr dialogues. You can finally understand what they are saying.
(Bethesda developers have inserted commentaries at the string files with the proper translation of each sentence the draugrs say... I simply inserted those translations in the subtitles.)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#e69138][size=6]Mindoraan Qethgaaf!  (Understandable Draugrs!)[/size][/color]

Ever got curious about what the Draugr keep saying every time you fight them? 

This mod adds English subtitles to the Draugr dialogues.  You can finally understand what they are saying!

(If you open the Draugr's dialogue properties via Creation Kit, you can see that Bethesda's developers have inserted commentaries explaining the meaning of each sentence the Draugrs say.

I simply inserted those translations into the subtitles themselves. In other words, these translations are 100% official.)

Now Instead of the subtitle saying  "Boolag aaz, mal lir!"  it will say "Boolag aaz, mal lir! (Beg for mercy, puny worm!)"



I hope you guys will enjoy it!

[youtube]f2d5A84nRYY[/youtube]


[youtube]Bq7261qYKzI[/youtube]



[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Compatibility:

[/size][/color]It should be compatible with everything. 

[size=4][color=#b6d7a8]Installation instructions:[/color]

[/size]1) Download only one of the 4 files available in here

2) Activate the .esp

[size=4][color=#ea9999]Uninstall:[/color]

[/size]1) Hurt my feelings

2) Delete the .esp   (Can be done at any time without any risks)
author: Pandora
